Instance.description: Interaction that allows a Sim to discover an existing secret autonomously.

TunableVariant.name: check_if_safe_for_tuned_participant
TunableVariant.display: Check If Safe For Tuned Participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled and the tuned participant is a child or a teen, the picker should only include child-teen-safe secrets.

TunableVariant.name: secret_keeper_participants
TunableVariant.description: If set, it will check if there are any secrets that the chosen participant knows.

TunableVariant.name: secret_keeper_status
TunableVariant.description: If set we filter all the existing secrets with the selected secret_keeper_status (DISCOVERED, BURIED, REVEALED...)

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The status of the secret to indicate if it is still an undiscovered secret, if it has been revealed, buried

TunableEnum.name: secret_owner_participant
TunableEnum.description: The sim from whom we will get the secret.

TunableVariant.name: secret_severity
TunableVariant.description: If set we sort all the existing secrets, giving priority to those secrets with the selected severity.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The severity of the secret that will determine the impact of the scandal effects when the secret is revealed.
